Planned Work
[5] Trains replace the [2] in the Bronx and Brooklyn
[2] Trains replace the [5] between Dyre Av and E 180 St

Late Nights, 10 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Aug 24 - 28

[5] service operates as follows:
• Via the [2] between 241 St and E 180 St
• Between E 180 St and Flatbush Av (via Lexington Av Exp), making local stops in Brooklyn

[2] service operates as follows:
• Via the [5] between Dyre Av and E 180 St
• Between E 180 St and 34 St-Penn Station, the last stop




Planned Work
[4] New Lots Av-bound trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to Utica Av

Late Night, 11:45 PM Mon to 5 AM Tue, Aug 24 - 25

Trains stop at Franklin Av.

For Bergen St, Grand Army Plaza and Eastern Pkwy, take the [5]* instead. Transfer between
trains at Nevins St (across the platform), Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr or Franklin Av.

For service to Nostrand and Kingston Avs, take the [4] to Utica Av and transfer to a
Woodlawn-bound [4].

For service from these stations, take the [4] to Franklin Av and transfer to a
New Lots Av-bound [4].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work
[A] Downtown trains run express from 125 St to 59 St-Columbus Circle

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Aug 24 - 28 • Aug 31 - Sep 4 • Tue to Fri, Sep 8 - 11

For service to 116, 110, 103, 96, 86, 81 and 72 Sts, take the [A] to 59 St-Columbus Circle and
transfer to an Inwood-bound [A].

For service from these stations, take the [A] to 125 St and transfer to a
downtown [A].

Alternate travel note:
Use nearby [1] stations instead and transfer between trains at 59 St-Columbus Circle.




Planned Work
[A] Inwood-bound trains skip 135 St, 155 St and 163 St

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Aug 24 - 28 • Aug 31 - Sep 4 • Tue to Fri, Sep 8 - 11

For service to these stations, take the [A] to 145 St or 168 St and
transfer to a downtown [A].

For service from these stations, take the [A] to 145 St or 125 St and
transfer to an Inwood-bound [A].

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Planned Work

Late Nights, 12:30 AM to 5 AM, Tue to Fri, Aug 25 - 28

Trains stop at 36, Steinway, 46 Sts, Northern Blvd, 65 St, Roosevelt, Elmhurst, Grand Avs,
Woodhaven Blvd, 63 Dr and 67 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Work
[D] Norwood-bound trains skip 25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St, Union St and DeKalb Av

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Wed, Aug 24 - 26

For 25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St and Union St, take the [N] instead.
Transfer between trains at 36 St or Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

For service to DeKalb Av, transfer to the [N] or [Q] at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

For service from this station, take the [D] [N] or [Q] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr
and transfer to a Norwood-bound [D].




Planned Work
[D] Norwood-bound trains skip 155, 161, 167, 170 and 174-175 Sts

Late Nights, 10:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Aug 24 - 28

For service to these stations, take the [D] to Tremont Av and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D].

For service from these stations, take the [D] to 145 St and transfer to a Norwood-bound [D].

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: Waterbury
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 06/04/2015 11:57AM

To accommodate the final phase of a $5.8 million priority-repair project on Devon Bridge, a new, temporary transfer point --Devon Transfer--has been built where the Waterbury Branch and New Haven Line meet. Track 3, also known as the inbound local track, will be out of service continuously for six months while the work occurs. As a result, starting Monday, May 4th: All Waterbury Branch customers who usually transfer to main line trains at Bridgeport will instead get off at the new Devon Transfer location, cross the walkway, and wait for a train on Track 1, also known as the inbound express track. Waterbury Branch customers who travel to New Haven will transfer again at Bridgeport for a main line train connection to New Haven. Northbound customers will be dropped off main line trains at the Devon Transfer and board a waiting train for Waterbury. See more details at http://bit.ly/1a5iYhwÂ
